content: the brain eater dice bag is a variation of my brain eater fish hat the finished bag is about 5-6 inches deep from just below the drawstring round i used worsted weight yarn for mine but i think any yarn would work just use the suggested hook for your yarn thinner or thicker yarns will change the bag size the same as a bigger or smaller hook would change the bag size materials needed worsted weight yarn - two different shades of blue or color of your choice white red black & yellow hooks - 5 5mm for body and 4 5mm for all other parts scissors yarn needle stitch marker beads or button for drawstring gauge not important this would be a good stash buster as it doesn t need and entire skein of yarn to finish
